EnemyInfo.Name: Grapple Ripper
EnemyInfo.Description:
A flying shelled enemy that moves back and forth, turning around when it hits a solid tile. The enemy also has specified horizontal bounds in which is will try to stay within. In addition it is grapplable.
There is a strange bug that prevents on initial direction parameter from working correctly. $A2:E1E7 should be changed from 0xFEFF to 0x0100.

Property.Name: Left Bound
Property.Description: Left bound in pixels. This is in absolute pixels in the room, not relative to the enemy's starting position.

Property.Name: Right Bound
Property.Description: Right bound in pixels. This is in absolute pixels in the room, not relative to the enemy's starting position.

Property.Name: Speed
Property.Description: Speed to move. Table located at A2:EA56.

Property.Name: Direction
Property.Description: Initial direction to move. This is bugged without the fix and will always move right initially.
